roles.title: Business Analyst
roles.summary: Bridge business goals with data-driven improvements across processes.
roles.details: Analyzes operations, elicits requirements, and partners with stakeholders to deliver measurable improvements.
roles.outlook: Strong demand across tech, healthcare, finance, and public sectors.

roles.title: Operations Manager
roles.summary: Own day-to-day excellence with Lean practices and KPI accountability.
roles.details: Drives throughput, quality, and cost with cross-functional teams and continuous improvement.
roles.outlook: Consistent demand in manufacturing, logistics, and services.

roles.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
roles.summary: Protect systems and data with proactive monitoring and controls.
roles.details: Implements security controls, detects anomalies, and responds to incidents.

roles.title: Product Manager
roles.summary: Define vision, align teams, and ship outcomes customers love.
roles.details: Owns roadmap, prioritizes problems, and coordinates delivery across engineering, design, and GTM.
roles.outlook: Strong in software and platform companies.

roles.title: Data Analyst
roles.summary: Turn raw data into insights and decision-ready visuals.
roles.details: Builds analyses, dashboards, and experiments to drive action.
roles.outlook: Broad demand as orgs modernize analytics.

roles.title: Project Manager
roles.summary: Plan, coordinate, and deliver projects on time and budget.
roles.details: Owns scope, schedule, and risk; facilitates teams and stakeholders.
